document_name: PD_HCFC Phase-out in PU Foam production-Final with Signatures.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
HCFC-141b use phasedout and replaced by either methyl formate, or n-pentane in PU
insulation foam production in four beneficiary enterprises

project_descr: Phase Out of Hydrochlorofluorocarbons in the foam production sector in Egypt
project_title: Phase-out of HydroChloroFluoroCarbons in Egypt Foam Sect
